QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: ntripServerConnectEnabled
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Connect to NTRIP server using specified address/port

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: ntripMountpoint
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: NTRIP Mount Point. Leave blank for RTCM over TCP

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: Ntrip白名单
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: RTCM 消息 ID 白名单,逗号分隔
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: RTCM 通过 mavlink 发送的消息.将所有消息留空
QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: ntripWhitelist
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: RTCM Message ID Whitelist, comma separated
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: RTCM Messages to send over mavlink. Leave blank for all messages

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: ntripForceNtripV1
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Force NTRIP V1 instead of V2
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: By default the system will connect using NTRIP V2. Check this box to force NTRIP V1

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: Ntrip 从车辆上获取 nmea pos
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: 对于 VRS,从车辆的起始位置获取 NMEA 位置
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: 启用 VRS 后,当基站位置不可用时,从车辆的起始位置获取 NMEA 位置
QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: ntripTakeNmeaPosFromVehicle
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: For VRS, take NMEA position from vehicle's home position
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: When VRS is enabled, take NMEA position from vehicle's home position when Base Station position is not available
